Call stack

Callback queue

V8

The call stack

one thread == one thing at a time

Call Stack

function multiply(a, b) {
    return a * b;
}

function square(n) {
    return multiply(n,n);
}

function print(n) {
    var result = square(n);
    console.log(result);
}

print(4);

Call Stack

function foo() {
    throw new Error('Oops!');
}

function bar() {
    foo();
}

function baz() {
    bar();
}

baz();

Call Stack

function foo() {
    throw new Error('Oops!');
}

function bar() {
    foo();
}

function baz() {
    bar();
}

baz();

Call Stack

function foo() {
    return foo();
}


foo();

Blocking

What happens when things are slow?

Call Stack

var foo = $.getSync("//:foo.com");
var bar = $.getSync("//:bar.com");
var xyz = $.getSync("//:xyz.com");

console.log(foo);
console.log(bar);
console.log(xyz);

Why is this a problem?

because, browsers.

The solution?

asynchronous callback

Call Stack

console.log('Hi');
setTimeout(function() {
    console.log('You missed me. :(');
},1000);
console.log('Bye');

Concurrently and Event loop

One thing at a time, except not really.

Call Stack

console.log('Hi');
setTimeout(function() {
    console.log('You missed me. :(');
},1000);
console.log('Bye');

Call Stack

console.log('Hi');
setTimeout(function() {
    console.log('You missed me. :(');
},0);
console.log('Bye');

Call Stack

console.log('Hi');
$.get('http://foo.com', function() {
    console.log('I am done. :)');
});
console.log('Bye');
